text:
Myshell and the bug: 
marcio@oberon batik-1.5.1]$ java -jar batik-rasterizer.jar -indexed 8 -m 
image/jpeg -validate -onload ../DiagramaUML_AgroREDE.svg 
About to transcode 1 SVG file(s) 
 
Converting DiagramaUML_AgroREDE.svg to ../DiagramaUML_AgroREDE.jpg ... 
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
creator: vellociraptor@yahoo.com.br

text:
You probably just want to add '-Xmx256m' to the command line to let
Batik run in a reasonable amount of memory (the default is tiny).
creator: deweese@apache.org
